channel.title: How do i make a wild area a safe area?
channel.description: I am making a second training area and it's out in the wild and I want to know how to make a wild area safe. There's a tutorial on how to do it but it makes NO sense to me

item.title: How do i make a wild area a safe area?
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

thank you so much! sorry i’m just bad with x and y coords

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a wild area a safe area?

item.title: How do i make a wild area a safe area?
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

If you look at the coordinates, you’ll notice they make up a rectangle.

The 2 X coords might set the east/west boundary, and the 2 Y coords might set the north/south boundary of the rectangle.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a wild area a safe area?
